channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Trump says US will begin stopping Venezuelan drug traffickers by land: 'Going to start very soon'
item.description: Speaking to service members on Thanksgiving, President Trump said the U.S. will soon begin stopping Venezuelan drug traffickers "by land," noting that...

item.title: What is Evacuation Day? The forgotten holiday that predates Thanksgiving -- and once eclipsed July 4
item.description: New York's Evacuation Day once rivaled Independence Day in popularity, featuring grand parades. Explore how this historic commemoration faded away.

item.title: Sorkin Rounds Up the Usual Suspects
item.description: Andrew Ross Sorkin’s 1929 is an artful yet flawed reprise of John Kenneth Galbraith’s book on the same topic.

item.title: Trump orders new immigration curbs as FBI probes guard shooting
item.description: Authorities have launched a nationwide terrorism investigation into what Jeanine Pirro, the US attorney for DC, called a “brazen and targeted” attack.

item.title: This Thanksgiving, Heed the Words of George Washington
item.description: A note about liberty, gratitude, and contentment.

item.title: The Real First Thanksgiving Happened In Virginia Two Years Before The Pilgrims
item.description: It was English settlers in Virginia, not Pilgrims in New England, who observed America’s first Thanksgiving.

item.title: DHS moves to cut off South Texas Catholic Charities over migrant grant ‘misconduct,’ documents say

item.title: On Target: The Perfect Guide To Gifting Your Favorite Firearm-Loving Friends And Family
item.description: Get the most bang for your buck with these nine gun-themed gift suggestions.

item.title: Sorry, mom. The shopping bots suggested a bathrobe for Christmas
item.description: Bloomberg asked several AI bots — including Amazon’s Rufus, OpenAI’s ChatGPT and Walmart Inc.’s Sparky — what to buy mom for Christmas.

item.title: Thanksgiving Day in America
item.description: As America approaches its 250th year of independence, there is much to be grateful for.

item.title: Faith leader explains why Charlie Kirk's final Thanksgiving message matters
item.description: Charlie Kirk's Thanksgiving legacy continues inspiring Americans after his death, emphasizing gratitude, prayer and disconnecting from technology.

item.title: America Is Still Worth Giving Thanks For
item.description: For the frustrated and disillusioned on the right, here are four foundational reasons to give thanks for this great country.

item.title: Two National Guardsmen Shot After Democrats Dubbed Their Presence In DC An ‘Occupation’
item.description: Democrats have relentlessly fomented fear and hatred of troops deployed to help reduce crime and violence.

item.description: The excellent Norman Rockwell Museum delivers a holiday feast of art.

item.description: Were the pilgrims really ‘ethno-nationalists’?

item.title: JPMorgan to build new London headquarters in Canary Wharf
item.description: "This building will represent our lasting commitment to the city, the UK" and its staff, said JPMorgan CEO Jamie Dimon.

item.title: Thanksgiving recipes from America’s first families — presidential dishes to try at home
item.description: Discover presidential recipes that shaped White House Thanksgiving traditions, from Bush family deviled eggs to Reagan's pumpkin pecan pie and more.

item.title: Trump wants to remake the Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool
item.description: President Trump has seemingly set his sights on a new renovation project -- the Lincoln Memorial Reflecting Pool.

item.title: The world’s top designers are exploring whether the private sector can move the needle on the UN’s SDGs
item.description: “Every time you design something, you're making an active choice on the future you want to build,” says Ben Sheppard, founder of Design for Good.

item.title: Mark Carney says Canada’s trading relationship with the U.S. was ‘once a strength,’ but ‘now a weakness’
item.description: Canada struck a pipeline deal with Alberta on Thursday to diversify the country's oil exports beyond the U.S.
